title: Beyonce flaunts cleavage as she goes braless in low-cut mini dress in series of Instagram snaps
text:
She loves to model her outfits for her social media followers.

And on Wednesday, Beyonce was at it again, posting a series of sexy fashion shots to her Instagram.

The sultry star, 38, flashed her cleavage as she posed braless in a very low-cut patterned mini dress.

Queen Bey: She loves to model her outfits for her social media followers. And on Wednesday, Beyonce was at it again, posting a series of sexy fashion shots to her Instagram

She wore her long hair loose and was made-up with glossy red lip color.

She strutted in black heels with an ankle strap and diamante tassels round the heels.

The Lemonade singer rounded out her look with statement diamond earrings, diamond jewelry on her hands and angular shades.

Eyeful: The sultry star, 38, flashed her cleavage as she posed braless in a very low-cut patterned mini dress

On trend: She wore her long hair loose and was made-up with glossy red lip color. The thigh-skimming outfit had long sleeves and cut-outs round the midriff

Photograph: The Lemonade singer pulled a face and struck a pose for the camera

Stepping out: Beyonce also shared a close-up of her black heels with diamante tassels

Close-up: She rounded out her look with statement diamond earrings

Blinged: She also wore diamond jewelry on her hands

Beyonce was among the stars who gathered in Atlanta, Georgia, on Saturday to celebrate the unveiling of Tyler Perry Studios.

Perry, an actor, writer and producer best known for his Madea series, is the first African-American to own a studio outright and without corporate backing.

His studio complex situated on 330 acres is one of the largest in the United States.

Beyonce shared photos of herself at the event with husband Jay-Z as she stepped out wearing a custom-made Yousef Al Jasmi yellow beaded gown.

She joined celebrities Denzel Washington, Whoppi Goldberg, Spike Lee, Halle Berry and Oprah Winfrey at the event.

Celebrity couple: Beyonce, accompanied by husband Jay-Z, was among the stars who gathered in Atlanta, Georgia, on Saturday to celebrate the unveiling of Tyler Perry Studios
description: The singer, 38, wore her long hair loose  and was made-up with glossy red lip color. She strutted in black heels with an ankle strap and diamante tassels round the heels.
